category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_aqa_staleness_factor
preference.preference_description: Deciding which appearances to check is along the lines of "check those which have been queried most, and most recently, and which haven't been checked recently". Finding out which have been queried most is a simple matter of looking for the largest values of N, adjustment for "most recently" is done by dividing the stored value of N by the staleness decay factor once for every day since N was last incremented (so that the older the audit, the less interesting it is).
